description: A vulnerability has been found in Shenzhen Ruiming Technology Streamax Crocus 1.3.40. Affected by this vulnerability is the function Download of the file /Service.do?Action=Download. Such manipulation of the argument Path leads to path traversal. The attack can be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.
